alert.note: Alert for Ste. Genevieve (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 20 at 11:02PM CDT until August 20 at 11:45PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Monroe County in southwestern Illinois... Northern Randolph County in southwestern Illinois... North central Ste. Genevieve County in southeastern Missouri... * Until 1145 PM CDT. * At 1101 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Bloomsdale, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Red Bud around 1115 PM CDT. Evansville around 1120 PM CDT. Baldwin around 1130 PM CDT. Sparta around 1140 PM CDT. Coulterville and Tilden around 1145 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Ruma, Walsh, Renault, Preston, Ames, Modoc, Prairie, Eden, Prairie Du Rocher and Kidd. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
